title: Expense Distribution by Category
insights: The largest expense category is Professional Services, representing 62.3% of total expenses ($1,200.00). This concentration suggests opportunities for targeted cost optimization in this area.

title: Monthly Financial Trends
insights: Monthly expenses have increased by 653.9% from the previous period, indicating growth trends that require strategic attention.

title: Tax Optimization Opportunities
insights: Total potential tax savings of $143.88 identified, with section 179 deduction representing the largest opportunity. Implementing these optimizations could significantly improve tax efficiency.
